nodes.text: The Mandalorian battle armor was a Mandalorian armor model that saw wide use during the Mandalorian Wars. This type of armor was employed by Mandalorian shock troopers and allowed them to survive long campaigns waged upon them by the Old Republic. It was particularly resilient to electrical based attacks.
Canderous Ordo, the first leader of the Mandalorians following the Mandalorian Wars, donned this armor and kept it in exceptional condition. Canderous integrated his armor with Mandalore's helmet.
